member.summary: Client constructor.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.BatchSendEmail(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.BatchSendEmailRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to send a TEXT or HTML email to multiple recipients at a time for marketing or notification purposes. By default, you can send emails using a template only. You need to create a recipient group with email addresses first and then send emails by group ID. SES supports scheduled and recurring email sending tasks. You need to pass in `TimedParam` for a scheduled task and `CycleParam` for a recurring one.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.BatchSendEmailSync(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.BatchSendEmailRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to send a TEXT or HTML email to multiple recipients at a time for marketing or notification purposes. By default, you can send emails using a template only. You need to create a recipient group with email addresses first and then send emails by group ID. SES supports scheduled and recurring email sending tasks. You need to pass in `TimedParam` for a scheduled task and `CycleParam` for a recurring one.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateEmailIdentity(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateEmailIdentityRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a sender domain. Before you can send an email using Tencent Cloud SES, you must create a sender domain as your identity. It can be the domain of your website or mobile app. You must verify the domain to prove that you own it and authorize Tencent Cloud SES to use it to send emails.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateEmailIdentitySync(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateEmailIdentityRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a sender domain. Before you can send an email using Tencent Cloud SES, you must create a sender domain as your identity. It can be the domain of your website or mobile app. You must verify the domain to prove that you own it and authorize Tencent Cloud SES to use it to send emails.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateEmailTemplate(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateEmailTemplateRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a TEXT or HTML email template. To create an HTML template, ensure that it does not include external CSS files. You can use {{variable name}} to specify a variable in the template. Note: Only an approved template can be used to send emails.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateEmailTemplateSync(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateEmailTemplateRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a TEXT or HTML email template. To create an HTML template, ensure that it does not include external CSS files. You can use {{variable name}} to specify a variable in the template. Note: Only an approved template can be used to send emails.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateReceiver(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateReceiverRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a recipient group, which is the list of target email addresses for batch sending emails. After creating a group, you need to upload recipient email addresses. Then, you can create a sending task and select the group to batch send emails.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateReceiverSync(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateReceiverRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to create a recipient group, which is the list of target email addresses for batch sending emails. After creating a group, you need to upload recipient email addresses. Then, you can create a sending task and select the group to batch send emails.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateReceiverDetail(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateReceiverDetailRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to add recipient email addresses (up to 20,000 at a time) to a recipient group. This will be processed asynchronously. If the data volume is large, it may take some time to upload. You can check the recipient group for the upload status and upload quantity. This API has basically the same feature as that of `CreateReceiverDetailWithData` except that it doesn't support uploading template parameters for email sending. You need to first call the `CreateReceiver` API to create a recipient group, then call this API to pass in recipient addresses, and finally call the `BatchSendEmail` API to batch send emails. This API supports adding more recipient addresses during upload but not address deduplication, so you need to make sure that the recipient addresses are not duplicate by yourself. This API can request up to 20,000 recipient addresses at a time, but the recipient group can contain up to 50,000 addresses currently.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.CreateReceiverDetailSync(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.CreateReceiverDetailRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to add recipient email addresses (up to 20,000 at a time) to a recipient group. This will be processed asynchronously. If the data volume is large, it may take some time to upload. You can check the recipient group for the upload status and upload quantity. This API has basically the same feature as that of `CreateReceiverDetailWithData` except that it doesn't support uploading template parameters for email sending. You need to first call the `CreateReceiver` API to create a recipient group, then call this API to pass in recipient addresses, and finally call the `BatchSendEmail` API to batch send emails. This API supports adding more recipient addresses during upload but not address deduplication, so you need to make sure that the recipient addresses are not duplicate by yourself. This API can request up to 20,000 recipient addresses at a time, but the recipient group can contain up to 50,000 addresses currently.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.DeleteBlackList(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.DeleteBlackListRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to unblocklist email addresses. If you confirm that a blocklisted recipient address is valid and active, you can remove it from Tencent Cloud’s address blocklist database.

member.summary: This API is used to unblocklist email addresses. If you confirm that a blocklisted recipient address is valid and active, you can remove it from Tencent Cloud’s address blocklist database.

member.summary: This API is used to get email sending status. Only data within 30 days can be queried. Default API request rate limit: 1 request/sec.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.SesClient.ListBlackEmailAddress(TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.ListBlackEmailAddressRequest)
member.summary: The API is used to get blocklisted addresses. In the case of a hard bounce, Tencent Cloud will blocklist the recipient address and do not allow any user to send emails to this address. If you confirm that this is a misjudgment, you can remove it from the blocklist.

member.summary: The API is used to get blocklisted addresses. In the case of a hard bounce, Tencent Cloud will blocklist the recipient address and do not allow any user to send emails to this address. If you confirm that this is a misjudgment, you can remove it from the blocklist.

member.summary: This API is used to query batch email sending tasks (including immediate, scheduled, and recurring tasks) by page. You can query task data including the number of emails requested to be sent, the number of sent emails, the number of cached emails, and task status.

member.summary: This API is used to set the SMTP password. Initially, no SMTP password is set for your email address, so emails cannot be sent over SMTP. To send emails over SMTP, you must set the SMTP password. The set password can be changed subsequently.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.Attachment.FileName
member.summary: Attachment name, which cannot exceed 255 characters. Some attachment types are not supported. For details, see [Attachment Types](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1288/51951?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.Attachment.Content
member.summary: Base64-encoded attachment content. You can send attachments of up to 4 MB in the total size. Note: The TencentCloud API supports a request packet of up to 8 MB in size, and the size of the attachment content will increase by 1.5 times after Base64 encoding. Therefore, you need to keep the total size of all attachments below 4 MB. If the entire request exceeds 8 MB, the API will return an error.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.Destination
member.summary: Recipient email addresses. You can send an email to up to 50 recipients at a time. Note: the email content will display all recipient addresses. To send one-to-one emails to several recipients, please call the API multiple times to send the emails.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.Subject
member.summary: Email subject.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.ReplyToAddresses
member.summary: Reply-to address. You can enter a valid personal email address that can receive emails. If this parameter is left empty, reply emails will fail to be sent.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.Template
member.summary: Template parameters for template-based sending. As `Simple` has been disused, `Template` is required.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.Simple
member.summary: Disused

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.Attachments
member.summary: Parameters for the attachments to be sent. The TencentCloud API supports a request packet of up to 8 MB in size, and the size of the attachment content will increase by 1.5 times after Base64 encoding. Therefore, you need to keep the total size of all attachments below 4 MB. If the entire request exceeds 8 MB, the API will return an error.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.Unsubscribe
member.summary: Unsubscribe option. `1`: provides an unsubscribe link; `0`: does not provide an unsubscribe link

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailRequest.TriggerType
member.summary: Email triggering type. `0` (default): non-trigger-based, suitable for marketing emails and non-immediate emails; `1`: trigger-based, suitable for immediate emails such as emails containing verification codes. If the size of an email exceeds a specified value, the system will automatically choose the non-trigger-based type.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.ToEmailAddress
member.summary: Recipient email address

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.FromEmailAddress
member.summary: Sender email address

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.SendStatus
member.summary: Tencent Cloud processing status 0: Successful. 1001: Internal system exception. 1002: Internal system exception. 1003: Internal system exception. 1003: Internal system exception. 1004: Email sending timed out. 1005: Internal system exception. 1006: You have sent too many emails to the same address in a short period. 1007: The email address is in the blocklist. 1008: The sender domain is rejected by the recipient. 1009: Internal system exception. 1010: The daily email sending limit is exceeded. 1011: You have no permission to send custom content. Use a template. 1013: The sender domain is unsubscribed from by the recipient. 2001: No results were found. 3007: The template ID is invalid or the template is unavailable. 3008: The sender domain is temporarily blocked by the recipient domain. 3009: You have no permission to use this template. 3010: The format of the `TemplateData` field is incorrect. 3014: The email cannot be sent because the sender domain is not verified. 3020: The recipient email address is in the blocklist. 3024: Failed to precheck the email address format. 3030: Email sending is restricted temporarily due to a high bounce rate. 3033: The account has insufficient balance or overdue payment.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.DeliverStatus
member.summary: Recipient processing status 0: Tencent Cloud has accepted the request and added it to the send queue. 1: The email is delivered successfully. `DeliverTime` indicates the time when the email is delivered successfully. 2: The email is discarded. `DeliverMessage` indicates the reason for discarding. 3: The recipient's ESP rejects the email, probably because the email address does not exist or due to other reasons. 8: The email is delayed by the ESP. `DeliverMessage` indicates the reason for delay.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.DeliverMessage
member.summary: Description of the recipient processing status

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.RequestTime
member.summary: Timestamp when the request arrives at Tencent Cloud

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.DeliverTime
member.summary: Timestamp when Tencent Cloud delivers the email

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.UserOpened
member.summary: Whether the recipient has opened the email

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.UserClicked
member.summary: Whether the recipient has clicked the links in the email

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.UserUnsubscribed
member.summary: Whether the recipient has unsubscribed from the email sent by the sender

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.UserComplainted
member.summary: Whether the recipient has reported the sender

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Ses.V20201002.Models.SendEmailStatus.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.
